name: SplitUp
description:
-Team introduction-

This game was developed in 2023GGJ, and our team name is Lan song of starry night:) This game is composed of our team members BluceLiSr1o6x,:), Seiung, Vacunname, An Ge and Tits. I hope you can have a good time.

-Background introduction-

The potted plants that fled the downtown gradually went deep into the inaccessible forest to find the lost seeds. ……

-The game is introduced-

This is a local two-person cooperation platform action puzzle game, using the art style of retro animation. In the game, you and your partner will play the roles of flowers and flowerpots respectively, make rational use of their abilities and organs, collect seeds scattered in the scene, and cooperate with each other in a series of levels.

—Instructions for use—

Flower pot: [a] and [d]-move left and right;

[W], [S]- Adjust the growth height of roots.

==================================

Flower: [Right mouse button]-Jump out from the root;

【 Left mouse button 】-Launch hook lock in face-to-face direction;

[←], [→]-Change the orientation.

-Tips--

There are some hidden cheat codes in the game waiting for you to discover.
